Author:

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum aumiks::E_Format

Sound output format.

Enumeration defining possible sound output formats. All currently supported formats are 16 bits per sample.

Enumerator:
MONO_16_11025 

Mono 11025 Hz.

MONO_16_22050 

Mono 22050 Hz.

MONO_16_44100 

Mono 44100 Hz.

STEREO_16_11025 

Stereo 11025 Hz.

STEREO_16_22050 

Stereo 22050 Hz.

STEREO_16_44100 

Stereo 44100 Hz.

Function Documentation

unsigned aumiks::BytesPerFrame ( E_Format  format)

Returns frame size for given sound output format.

Returns number of bytes per frame for given sound output format. The sound frame is the sound data for a single sampling rate tick. Each frame consists of number of channels samples (e.g. mono: 1 frame = 1 sample, stereo: 1 frame = 2 samples).

Parameters:
format- format to return the frame size of.
Returns:
the size of the frame in bytes.
unsigned aumiks::SamplesPerFrame ( E_Format  format)

Returns number of samples per frame for given sound output format.

In fact, this function returns number of channels of the given sound output format.

Parameters:
format- format for which to return the frame size in samples.
Returns:
size of the frame in samples.
unsigned aumiks::SamplingRate ( E_Format  format)

Returns sampling rate for given sound output format.

Returns:
Sampling rate in Hz.
